user.title: AccuWeather Weather Integration
user.description: Configure AccuWeather weather integration to get weather data for your location. Enter the name of your city or specific location.

data_description.location: Enter city name, district, or specific location

select_location.title: Select Exact Location
select_location.description: Found matching locations. Please select the exact location from the list below:

data_description.location_choice: Select the location that best matches your area

configure_options.title: Configure Update Options
configure_options.description: Set how often weather data should be updated. Shorter intervals update faster but use more resources.

data_description.update_interval: Choose from 300-3600 seconds (5-60 minutes). Recommended: 900-1800 seconds (15-30 minutes)

update_interval.title: Configure Update Interval
update_interval.description: Choose the time between weather data updates from AccuWeather. Shorter time = faster updates but more resource usage.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to AccuWeather. Please check your internet connection.
error.invalid_location: Invalid location or not supported by AccuWeather.
error.no_locations_found: No locations found for the search term. Try a different name.
error.timeout: Timeout connecting to AccuWeather. Please try again later.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: This location is already configured. Cannot add duplicates.

init.title: Update AccuWeather Settings
init.description: Change settings for AccuWeather integration. You can adjust the weather data update frequency.
